ComicInfo.Title: Prisoner of the Deep, Part Four
ComicInfo.Series: Dungeons and Dragons: Saturday Morning Adventures
ComicInfo.Summary:
In the exciting conclusion, the gang are reunited, but Sheila, Bobby, Presto, and Hank are still mesmerized by Phaelona's glamorous charm. Can anything stop an all-out fight between friends? As Phaelona's untamed powers let loose in full force, the architect of the whole adventure is revealed... and if you thought it was Venger, well, you'd be right!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | George Kambadais | 1 | B | Cover B | Brenda Hickey | 2 | C/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Tim Levins (a), Katrina Mae Hao (c) | 3 | D/CE | San Diego Comic-Con 2023 Exclusive Wrap-Around Cover | Bruno Oliveira | Missing |
